text: Wahed Wafa (Persian: واحد وفا) (also spelled as Wahid Wafa) (born October 2, 1952) is a Tajik singer from Afghanistan. He is one of the veteran singers of 1970s era singers that are now continuing their career in exile. He currently lives in Murrieta, California, U.S.. He was also a close colleague and friend of the late Ahmad Zahir. == References == *His Life is Music: Afghanistan’s Talented Singer. ** == Discography == (Not a comprehensive list, albums released prior to 1980 are not included) *1992: Pari Gul *1996?: Goli Jan *2004: Omr-e-Man Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Tajik musicians Category:Tajik singers Category:Afghan Tajik people Category:People from Murrieta, California
title: Wahed Wafa
